languages.text: Смерть его покрыта тайной, но факт, что тело его погребено в фамильном склепе фон Валанциус, говорит о многом — помимо Вольных Торговцев сей почести удостаивались лишь вернейшие слуги, спасавшие господ от гибели ценой жизни.

The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb speaks volumes. This great honour was reserved for only the Rogue Trader's most loyal servants who had saved their master's life by giving their own.
languages.original_text: Смерть его покрыта тайной, но факт, что тело его погребено в фамильном склепе фон Валанциус, говорит о многом — помимо Вольных Торговцев сей почести удостаивались лишь вернейшие слуги, спасавшие господ от гибели ценой жизни.

traits.locale_text: The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb says a lot. This great honour, apart from Rogue Traders, was bestowed only upon the most loyal servants, who saved their masters' life by giving away their own.

The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb says a lot. This great honour, apart from Rogue Traders, was bestowed only upon the most loyal servants, who saved their masters' life by giving away their own.

The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb speaks volumes. This great honour was reserved for only the Rogue Trader's most loyal servants, who saved their master's life by giving their own.

The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb speaks volumes. This great honour was reserved for only the Rogue Trader's most loyal servants who had saved their master's life by giving their own.

The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb speaks volumes. This great honour was reserved for only the Rogue Trader's most loyal servants who had saved their master's life by giving their own.

languages.text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎的死因笼罩在谜团之中，但他的遗体被安葬在冯·瓦兰修斯家族的陵墓之中，这样的事实足以说明一切。像这样的伟大荣誉，只会留给行商浪人最为忠诚的仆人，那些愿意牺牲自己来拯救王朝首领性命的人。
languages.original_text: The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb speaks volumes. This great honour was reserved for only the Rogue Trader's most loyal servants who had saved their master's life by giving their own.

traits.locale_text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎的死因笼罩在谜团之中，但他的遗体被安葬在冯·瓦兰修斯家族的陵墓之中，这样的事实足以说明一切。像这样的伟大荣誉，只会留给行商浪人最为忠诚的仆人，那些愿意牺牲自己来拯救王朝首领性命的人。

languages.text: Die Umstände seines Todes sind ein Mysterium, doch die Tatsache, dass seine Leiche in der Gruft der Familie von Valancius bestattet wurde, spricht Bände. Diese große Ehre war den engsten Dienern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} vorbehalten, die ihr eigenes Leben gegeben hatten, um das {mf|ihres Herren|ihrer Herrin} zu retten.
languages.original_text: The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb speaks volumes. This great honour was reserved for only the Rogue Trader's most loyal servants who had saved their master's life by giving their own.

traits.locale_text: Die Umstände seines Todes sind ein Mysterium, doch die Tatsache, dass seine Leiche in der Gruft der Familie von Valancius bestattet wurde, spricht Bände. Diese große Ehre war den engsten Dienern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} vorbehalten, die ihr eigenes Leben gegeben hatten, um das {mf|ihres Herren|ihrer Herrin} zu retten.

languages.text: Il mourut dans des circonstances mystérieuses, mais son corps fut inhumé dans le tombeau de la famille von Valancius, ce qui en dit long sur son sort. En effet, ce grand honneur était réservé aux serviteurs les plus loyaux du dirigeant de la dynastie, ceux qui avaient donné leur vie pour sauver celle de leur maître.
languages.original_text: The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb speaks volumes. This great honour was reserved for only the Rogue Trader's most loyal servants who had saved their master's life by giving their own.

traits.locale_text: Il mourut dans des circonstances mystérieuses, mais son corps fut inhumé dans le tombeau de la famille von Valancius, ce qui en dit long sur son sort. En effet, ce grand honneur était réservé aux serviteurs les plus loyaux du dirigeant de la dynastie, ceux qui avaient donné leur vie pour sauver celle de leur maître.

languages.text: Las circunstancias de su muerte son un misterio, pero el hecho de que su cuerpo esté enterrado en la tumba familiar de los von Valancius lo dice todo. Tal honor está reservado únicamente para los sirvientes más fieles de un Comerciante Independiente, aquellos que dan su vida para salvar la de su señor.
languages.original_text: The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb speaks volumes. This great honour was reserved for only the Rogue Trader's most loyal servants who had saved their master's life by giving their own.

traits.locale_text: Las circunstancias de su muerte son un misterio, pero el hecho de que su cuerpo esté enterrado en la tumba familiar de los von Valancius lo dice todo. Tal honor está reservado únicamente para los sirvientes más fieles de un Comerciante Independiente, aquellos que dan su vida para salvar la de su señor.

languages.text: 彼の死の状況は謎に包まれているが、その遺体がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の墓に埋葬されている事実がそれを物語っている。この偉大な栄誉は自由開拓者の最も忠実な使用人だけに許されたものであり、自らの命を捧げることで主人の命を救った者に与えられるという。
languages.original_text: The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb speaks volumes. This great honour was reserved for only the Rogue Trader's most loyal servants who had saved their master's life by giving their own.

traits.locale_text: 彼の死の状況は謎に包まれているが、その遺体がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の墓に埋葬されている事実がそれを物語っている。この偉大な栄誉は自由開拓者の最も忠実な使用人だけに許されたものであり、自らの命を捧げることで主人の命を救った者に与えられるという。

languages.text: Ölüm sebebi gizemini korumakla birlikte naaşının von Valancius aile mezarlığına gömülmesi, derin bir anlam taşımakta. Zira bu büyük onur; yalnızca Hür Tacir'in en sadık hizmetkârlarına, kendi yaşamlarını feda ederek efendilerinin hayatını kurtaranlara bahşedilir.
languages.original_text: The circumstances of his death are shrouded in mystery, but the fact that his body is buried in the von Valancius family tomb speaks volumes. This great honour was reserved for only the Rogue Trader's most loyal servants who had saved their master's life by giving their own.

traits.locale_text: Ölüm şekli gizemini koruyor ancak bedeninin von Valancius aile mezarlığına gömülmesi büyük anlam taşıyor. Bu büyük onur yalnızca Hür Tacir'in en sadık hizmetkârlarına, kendi yaşamlarını feda ederek efendilerinin hayatını kurtaranlara bahşedilmiştir.
